sentences.en: According to researchers, Internet addicts spend at least thirty to forty hours online every week.
sentences.cn: 根据调查, 网络爱好者在网上每周至少要花三十到四十个小时.

sentences.en: All the city’s schools will be online by the end of the year.
sentences.cn: 到年底，市里的所有学校都会连接因特网。

sentences.en: At night, she would go online and chat with her friends back home.
sentences.cn: 夜深人静时, 她会上网跟故乡的朋友聊天.

sentences.en: Don't you know how dangerous it is to meet men online?
sentences.cn: 你难道不知道在网上认识人是很危险的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Go to the website today and you can unsubscribe online.
Good, that way you can just make your corrections online.
sentences.cn: 好, 那样的话你可以通过网络作修正了.

sentences.en: It's not desperate to go online to meet new people.
sentences.cn: 在网上认识新朋友不算是冒险.

sentences.en: Online gaming allows players from around the world to challenge each other.
sentences.cn: 网络游戏使得全球的玩家可以相互较量。

sentences.en: Online help is just like printed documentation, a reference tool for perpetual intermediates.
sentences.cn: 在线帮助就像是打印的文档, 为永久的中间用户提供参考工具.

sentences.en: Online security is being built in to the system, not tagged on.
sentences.cn: 联机安全措施正被內置在系统中, 不是外加的.

sentences.en: Online shopping is both cheap and convenient.
sentences.cn: 网上购物既便宜又方便。

sentences.en: The computer might not support online working.
sentences.cn: 计算机不能承载联机工作.

sentences.en: There is counseling to help Internet addicts? even online .
sentences.cn: 有咨询机构帮助网络 沉迷 者.

sentences.en: ToolTips are modeless online help, and they are incredibly effective.
sentences.cn: 工具提示是非模态的在线帮助, 其效果好得不可思议.

sentences.en: You can chat to other people who are online.
sentences.cn: 你可以和其他在线的人聊天。

trans.tran_en: connected to other computers through the Internet, or available through the Internet
